ActorTalk: I didn't expect these small changes to make such a big difference. Every time I saw myself in the mirror with a new hairstyle, I barely recognized the person looking back...
Just like you said, Commandant, trying new things really does lead to new experiences.
There's still a bit of time before dinner. How about heading to Kuroro Coffee next? I heard they have an interactive activity where you can brew your own coffee. Want to try it together?
Sure thing. The pro barista is on the way.
